channel.title: Divine vs RSCD
channel.description:
Does Jagex care about Divine source based servers? Seems like RSCD servers will get shut down more easily.
So my question is which server is safer for running and not get sued?

item.title: Divine vs RSCD
item.dc:creator: @H4CK3R_OWNAGE H4CK3R OWNAGE
item.description:
@H4CK3R_OWNAGE wrote:

ok cross i have seen hundreds of servers with a donate button they dont get sued im an ex coder for this stuff and guess what dude put a donate button no sue here most people take down there servers and restart then put them backup[br][br][size=1]Posted on: September 01, 2008, 10:59:33 am[/size][hr]dude who really cares i havent notice any servers go down becasue of money envolved and im pretty sure jagex is to focused on rs2 then us so why woulds it really matter

Read full topic

item.title: Divine vs RSCD
item.dc:creator: @i_pk_pjers_i i_pk_pjers_i
item.description:
@i_pk_pjers_i wrote:

[quote=“ephemeral, post:21, topic:227073”]Alecks: Yes, I know what a Daemon is… But are you saying that the original RSCD (the one created by Sean, eXemplar etc.) was also called RSCDaemon? If so, I have to apologize, if it is correct. However, I really thought it would mean RSC-Development. I will be sure to ask Sean on MSN next time he is online

If the above is not correct, then I am afraid what you said does not make any sense to me.[/quote]No, the original was called RSCD. You were right.

Read full topic

item.title: Divine vs RSCD
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

Alecks: Yes, I know what a Daemon is… But are you saying that the original RSCD (the one created by Sean, eXemplar etc.) was also called RSCDaemon? If so, I have to apologize, if it is correct. However, I really thought it would mean RSC-Development. I will be sure to ask Sean on MSN next time he is online

If the above is not correct, then I am afraid what you said does not make any sense to me.

Read full topic

item.title: Divine vs RSCD
item.dc:creator: @Alecks Alecks
item.description:
@Alecks wrote:

ephemeral:

Anyhow, they are all based on the original RSCD no matter what… Even the one most people refer to RSCD today (which is called RSCDaemon), is still based on the original RSCD (which is called RSCDevelopment (or something similar)).

RSCD means RSCDaemon, Daemon is a process that runs 24/7, eg a server.

And btw Demonik was based off like version 12 or around there that Reines sent me, it had like player combat and a few extra shit that the v5 source didn’t have.

Read full topic

@extacy wrote:

Lol where are thou, jameson!?

item.title: Divine vs RSCD
item.dc:creator: @mapu mapu
item.description:
@mapu wrote:

[quote=“cr0ss, post:17, topic:227073”][quote author=i_pk_pjers_i link=topic=298395.msg2399140#msg2399140 date=1219330135]

It doesn’t matter what you use. Either RSCD or Demonik it will get shutdown if you get noticed.

You guys should have a look and realise that jagex have not taken a server down in a long time. The only reason servers have been going down are because they have been fighting with each other.

Nobody should even worry about jagex, and should focus on people like Tewl. If you didn’t realise jagex do not care about RSC, they have only really taken down what? 3 big servers?

[/quote]More like 4, but you’re right.

4 Big servers tbh.

  1. RSCD
  2. Stork
  3. Edge-Pkz(the ORIGINAL, not the these days wannabe copy)
  4. NemesisOnline

Others have been taken down voluntary and by corrupted staff…or lose in DDoS war.
NB! V3n1 never actually got the e-mail from JaGEX. He took all the money and he quit. I am more than sure he didn’t believe the phishing e-mails.
Gf.[/quote]

http://www.rfcexpress.com/lawsuit.asp?id=34391

Jameson A Pivette and John Doe 1-5 Vs Jagex

Copyright Infringement.

He was the only one to be taken to court.

Read full topic

item.title: Divine vs RSCD

item.description:
@cr0ss wrote:

[quote=“i_pk_pjers_i, post:16, topic:227073”][quote author=mapu link=topic=298395.msg2398753#msg2398753 date=1219310920]
It doesn’t matter what you use. Either RSCD or Demonik it will get shutdown if you get noticed.

You guys should have a look and realise that jagex have not taken a server down in a long time. The only reason servers have been going down are because they have been fighting with each other.

Nobody should even worry about jagex, and should focus on people like Tewl. If you didn’t realise jagex do not care about RSC, they have only really taken down what? 3 big servers?

[/quote]More like 4, but you’re right.[/quote]
4 Big servers tbh.

  1. RSCD
  2. Stork
  3. Edge-Pkz(the ORIGINAL, not the these days wannabe copy)
  4. NemesisOnline

Others have been taken down voluntary and by corrupted staff…or lose in DDoS war.
NB! V3n1 never actually got the e-mail from JaGEX. He took all the money and he quit. I am more than sure he didn’t believe the phishing e-mails.
Gf.

item.title: Divine vs RSCD
item.dc:creator: @Rog3r Rog3r
item.description:
@Rog3r wrote:

[quote=“cr0ss, post:12, topic:227073”][quote author=i_pk_pjers_i link=topic=298395.msg2397382#msg2397382 date=1219246155]

[quote author=cr0ss link=topic=298395.msg2397175#msg2397175 date=1219230613]
CHRIST ! As Divine AS Demonik are both based on RSCD v5. Lmao…
They are just lame and wannabe. You will get sued if you start asking for donations, money or advertise too much.
[/quote]V2 but thanks for trying. Jagex would shut down rscd v25 a lot faster because its better.
[/quote]It’s all wannabe crap for JaGEX, they wouldn’t give a damn.

I wonder if someone snitched out all rsc servers in mopar…[/quote]

For me, RSC servers are lame now.

It’s not even great to be honest. (No hard feelings)

Might aswell move on, the RSC servers are going down in population and if you guys get busted for RSC, then there is no point in working on them.

They have limits.

Read full topic
